summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > COMMON LINK WITH (PUB. & NAME DIFFERENT) bio.tools/cytoscape (CYTOSCAPE.ORG ; CYTOSCAPE.ORG/download.html), bio.tools/cytoscape_web (CYTOSCAPE.ORG), bio.tools/cytoscape.js (CYTOSCAPE.ORG) | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'Cytoscape' (bio.tools/cytoscape) | empowering workflow-based network analysis | Getting Started with Automation in R | Step-wise installation instructions leading to RCy3 vignettes | A collection of sample Apps that implement Cytoscape Automation
summary.name: Cytoscape Automation
